text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Lies. No new jobs are created. people are returning to their old jobs after furloughs due to the Covid19 crisis.  Now people are getting laid off again because of the rise in cases.  Frumpy Drumpf failed our country and is a traitor.  BYEDON
